name: Wisdom and Knowledge
description: Cognitive strengths that involve the acquisition and use of knowledge. These strengths help individuals learn, think creatively, and make sound decisions.

name: Courage
description: Emotional strengths that involve the exercise of will to accomplish goals in the face of opposition, external or internal. These strengths allow people to face adversity with bravery and integrity.

name: Humanity
description: Interpersonal strengths that involve tending to and befriending others. These strengths support compassion, empathy, and forming strong social bonds.

name: Justice
description: Civic strengths that support healthy and effective community life. These strengths help individuals work well in groups and promote fairness and leadership.

name: Temperance
description: Strengths that protect against excess. These strengths help people regulate emotions, avoid overindulgence, and behave with humility and control.

name: Transcendence
description: Strengths that connect us to the larger universe and provide meaning. These strengths foster a sense of purpose, gratitude, and appreciation for life.
